meta.title: Perfect Garage
meta.description: Create and share your 3-Cars Perfect Garage

meta.title: All Sports Cars
meta.description: List of all available sports cars

about.first_chapter: This website allows you to create your own Perfect Garage with 3 sports cars, and share it through social networks.
about.second_chapter: Why only 3 cars? Because as in real life, we have to make a choice. However you can create several garages: once saved, they'll be available in the menu.
about.third_chapter: As a sports cars fan, I created this website for free. There will be no ad or other commercial links. If you like this website, don't forget to share it!

layout.saved_button_tooltip_ko: Save your garage, you'll find it in the menu
layout.footer: . No cookie and no personal data are used by this website.
layout.share_link: Share the link for to this garage
